about_the_game:
Guide Tessa, a bunny employed in a clothing factory as a mechanic. The heroine moves through various departments, such as the sewing room and dyeing workshop, to repair broken mechanisms.


Our bunny has her paws full of work, so she constructs and programs robots to help. Additionally, if she falls into a dead end, she can rewind time. Each level is a small puzzle that requires your critical thinking.



Players will have access to an editor that allows them to create their own factory locations, which can be shared with others.



The game features a distinctive graphic style inspired by the works of Alphonse Mucha and Art Deco. It is an intriguing blend of plant motifs reminiscent of a rabbit's burrow and steam-powered machines from Steampunk.



Unique musical pieces have been prepared for the game, with instruments reflecting the different sections of the factory through which the protagonist moves. In the boiler room, you can clearly fell the steam, while in the office, you hear a pen moving across the accountants' parchments.
detailed_description:
Guide Tessa, a bunny employed in a clothing factory as a mechanic. The heroine moves through various departments, such as the sewing room and dyeing workshop, to repair broken mechanisms.


Our bunny has her paws full of work, so she constructs and programs robots to help. Additionally, if she falls into a dead end, she can rewind time. Each level is a small puzzle that requires your critical thinking.



Players will have access to an editor that allows them to create their own factory locations, which can be shared with others.



The game features a distinctive graphic style inspired by the works of Alphonse Mucha and Art Deco. It is an intriguing blend of plant motifs reminiscent of a rabbit's burrow and steam-powered machines from Steampunk.



Unique musical pieces have been prepared for the game, with instruments reflecting the different sections of the factory through which the protagonist moves. In the boiler room, you can clearly fell the steam, while in the office, you hear a pen moving across the accountants' parchments.
name: Clockwork Rabbit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support (anything after 2010 will work)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not obligatory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD Ryzen 3 (any models of those)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Obligatory

short_description: Tessa the bunny was hired at a textile factory as a mechanic. Create and program robots to solve logical puzzles.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Finnish, Slovak
